name: RPSB Inc.
description:
This is your first day at RPSB Inc., proud purveyor of rocks, paper, scissors and bombs. Your job is to stack boxes as efficiently as possible during your 30s shift, earning company credits in the process.

Be careful not put a box of paper on top of a box of rocks, a box of rocks on top of a box of scissors, a box of scissors on top of a box of paper, or a box of bombs on top of anything... Easy, really. Oh and, boxes lose their label when placed.

Credits will get you some upgrades and, maybe, maybe, somewhere down the line, if you work hard enough, an actual salary. Maybe.

Made for Weekly Game Jam - Week 154. My first game jam!

Controls

  • left/right to move the boxes
  • down/space/enter to place them
  • x to end your shift early
